patthana14.3:4.1: Hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:4.2: Hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:4.3: Hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.3:5.1: Hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:5.2: Hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:5.3: Hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.3:6.1: Hetusampayuttañca hetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:6.2: Hetusampayuttañca hetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:6.3: Hetusampayuttañca hetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate nava.
